Title: Relates to presumed consent to organ and tissue donation; repealer
Summary: Directs the commissioner of motor vehicles to modify applications for driver's licenses and non-driver identification cards in a manner that deems consent to organ and tissue donation unless the applicant expressly elects not to consent.
LawCode: Amd §§490 & 502, rpld §502 sub 1, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to presumed consent to organ and tissue donation; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating to licensure of drivers
